sys_hub_action_instance.comment: updating water task status to completed as the outdoor plants are watered
getting distinct locations from plants table for retrieving weather
updating today as last watered date in plant
retrieving rain status by passing latitude & longitude taken from locations
getting every outdoor plant by locations where raining

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: checking if there is rain using rain status
executes when there is no raining.
